translations: 伙伴，战友；同志（用于社会主义政党的成员之间）

sentences.sentence: He vowed to himself to avenge his martyred comrade.
sentences.translation: 他暗暗发誓要为牺牲的同志报仇。

sentences.sentence: Better be careful of your bookish approach, comrade.
Most of the goats ran away from their rough comrade.
sentences.translation: 大多数山羊都从它们粗暴的伙伴身边跑开了。
